      • moveFigure

        public boolean moveFigure(int xOld,
                 int yOld,
                 int xNew,
                 int yNew)
        Moves Figure from old position to new position.
        Parameters:
        xOld - Current x-coordinate
        yOld - Current y-coordinate
        xNew - New x-coordinate
        yNew - New y-coordinate
        Returns:
        true if successfully set. false if out of bound.

      • parse

        public void parse(java.lang.String text)
        Parses user input. Example: "Ka1-Ka2" Should move the _K_ing from a1 to a2.
        Parameters:
        text - to be parsed
